name: Tuna Niçoise
recipe: Fresh tuna, boiled potatoes, green beans, cherry tomatoes, boiled eggs, and olives combined in a vibrant salad, drizzled with a zesty vinaigrette—Tuna Nicoise, a delicious classic

name: Chicken and Walnut Salad
recipe: Tender grilled chicken, crunchy walnuts, crisp lettuce, juicy grapes, and tangy dressing come together in a delightful Chicken Walnut Salad, a perfect balance of flavors and textures

name: Roast Duck Breast
recipe: Roasted duck breast (served pink) with gratin potato and a griottine cherry sauce

name: Escalope de Veau
recipe: Escalope de Veau is a classic dish made by coating thinly sliced veal in breadcrumbs, then frying it until golden brown and crispy, resulting in a tender and flavorful meat dish.
